categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Fixer Twelve was a Human male who worked for the reconstituted Sith Empire's Imperial Intelligence during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. An agent of Operations Division, he was originally a field operative until his lungs received severe damage when a Jedi stabbed him with a lightsaber. He then became a Fixer assigned to the Imperial Citadel.
